parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: The name of the table containing the requested items.

parameter.name: attributesToGet
parameter.description: The names of one or more attributes to retrieve.

parameter.name: conditionalOperator
parameter.description: A logical operator to apply to the conditions in the expected map.

parameter.name: exclusiveStartKey
parameter.description: The primary key of the first item that this operation will evaluate.

parameter.name: expressionAttributeNames
parameter.description: One or more values that can be substituted in an expression.

parameter.name: expressionAttributeValues
parameter.description: One or more values that can be substituted in an expression.

parameter.name: filterExpression
parameter.description: A string that contains conditions that DynamoDB applies after the Query operation.

parameter.name: indexName
parameter.description: The name of an index to query.

parameter.name: keyConditionExpression
parameter.description: The condition that specifies the key value(s) for items to be retrieved.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of items to evaluate.

parameter.name: projectionExpression
parameter.description: A string that identifies one or more attributes to retrieve from the table.

parameter.name: queryFilter
parameter.description: This is a condition that evaluates the scan results and returns only the desired values.

parameter.name: returnConsumedCapacity
parameter.description: Determines the level of detail about provisioned throughput consumption that is returned in the response.

parameter.name: scanIndexForward
parameter.description: Boolean type, specifies the order for index traversal.

parameter.name: select
parameter.description: The attributes to be returned in the result.
